sense.gloss: to go mad, to lose one's mind, to go crazy, to go insane
to get out of order, to go amiss, to malfunction, to become imprecise
to go wrong (of a plan or expectation, etc.), to fall through, to get mixed up
to go crazy (over someone or something), to get enthusiastic, to go wild

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓ひと↓つ↑間違↑↓まちが↓えば↑一↑↓いち↓↑里↑↓り↓も↑狂↑↓|くる↓う|。
sdata.e: A miss is as good as a mile.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑孤独↑↓こどく↓な↑人生↑↓じんせい↓を↑送↑↓お|く↓る↑運命↑↓う|んめい↓にあった。
sdata.e: It was his fate to live a lonely life.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑怒↑↓いか↓りで↑気↑↓き↓も↑狂↑↓|くる↓う|ほどだった。
↑猛↑↓たけ↓り↑狂↑↓|くる↓う|↑海↑↓うみ↓の↑嵐↑↓あらし↓のように↑一族↑↓いちぞく↓が↑激↑↓はげ↓しく↑走↑↓はし↓る。
sdata.e: Clans run wild like a storm in a raging sea.

sdata.j: ↑我↑↓われ↓らの↑頭上↑↓ずじょう↓に↑荒↑↓あ↓れ↑狂↑↓|くる↓う|↑砂↑↓すな↓と↑剣↑↓けん↓の↑煌↑↓きらめ↓きは、まるで↑夜空↑↓よぞら↓に↑降↑↓ふ↓り↑注↑↓そそ↓ぐ↑流星↑↓りゅうせい↓の↑如↑↓ごと↓し。
sdata.e: The turbulent sands above our heads, the flinging of our swords... they're naught but falling stars in the night sky.
